metadata.name: loneliness
metadata.description:
“Loneliness is harder than covid”
Her name is Hatice. He lives alone in a town. Her husband passed away years ago. Their children, on the other hand, migrated from the town to the big cities for better opportunities. After all these, the event that hurt the old woman the most was the pandemic conditions. Because she doesn't see her neighbors. All he does is look at old photos and live in memories.
I went to photograph Hatice's loneliness. I listened to her for a while. The sentence that hurt me the most. "Living alone is harder than living with COVID"

Features of NFT picture:
Location:Trabzon/Turkey
Shooting date 13.06.2021
Resolution: 300dpi
Dimension: 7309x4873
Size: 18.3mb
print:1/1
f.5 1/40sn iso-500
